title: padmanAbha mAm pAhi
sahitya:
padmanAbha mAm pAhi pAhi shrI paNipati shayana dayayAnakayA


anupallavi

  padmajAta dhAta bhava sindhubOdha pANDusunu dUta bhaktha pArijAta


caraNam    dharma pAlanAttha vividhAvatAra jandu kOTilIlA nAtya sUtradhAra
 nirmalAbja vaktra kamalA kaLatra nIla mEgha gAtra vanajadaLa nEtra
